room_title: Escape room "Time Machine" by Edge Of Escape in Chicago
review: This was our first time visiting an Escape room and it did not disappoint! We did the Time Machine and really had a great time!  We were  impressed with the story line and the detail of the room. It was challenging and you really had to be on your toes. It was a lot of fun and I highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Time Machine" by Edge Of Escape in Chicago
review: Had a GREAT experience in the Time Machine! Wonderful hostess, great facility, loads of fun! Will definitely come back again.

room_title: Escape room "Time Machine" by Edge Of Escape in Chicago
review: We went with a group of 8 and it was a blast! This was my first escape room experience and I would recommend this place to anyone! Everything was so well put together and the rooms and props were really cool and felt so real. It definitely got you thinking as well! The staff there was really friendly and fun as well! I can’t wait to go again!

room_title: Escape room "Time Machine" by Edge Of Escape in Chicago
review: A great experience! Family run by great people. High quality puzzels, probably won't need to take notes lol. Everything is there for you to check again. Very cool authentic feel to the props in the room! Will definitely go again soon!

room_title: Escape room "Time Machine" by Edge Of Escape in Chicago
review: We’ve been to a bunch of different escape rooms, and this one tops all of those. Great, unique design with a one of a kind game experience.

room_title: Escape room "Time Machine" by Edge Of Escape in Chicago
review: This place is fantastic. It’s an escape room on steroids. Super creative and mind-blowing. Their main goal is to make people happy and make sure they have a great time. I know they are working on 2 more rooms. Can’t wait until those are done. Highly recommended!
